images.description: Own King's Landing and Storm's End. Their words are 'Ours is the fury'.
Own the Iron Islands. Their words are 'We do not sow'.
Own Casterly Rock. Their words are 'Hear me roar', but are unofficially 'Lannisters always pay their debts'.
Own Winterfell. Their words are 'Winter is coming'.
Own King's Landing. Their words are 'Fire and blood'. They originally trace their heritage back from Old Valyria.
